page.title: 05SCHOOL INNERLEITHEN
page.content: Located in beautiful surroundings. Roll of over 230 pupils.Includes, 7 mainstream classes, a nursery and two special classes.Staff comprises- Head Teacher and ten class teachers, including an Assist.Head..Visiting staff for remedial,art,craft,music home economics physical educat.Part- time secretarial auxiliary janitorial and kitchen staff.Two storey,harled building has a large hall,a gym, a swimming pool and twelve classrooms. Extensive grounds include a netball court, football and rugby pitches A broad curriculum is followed throughout the school. Orienteering skiing and canoeing are outdoor pursuits. During the session pupils make visits outwith school. Academic and sports success gains points for Houses, Leithen, Glenormiston, Traquair and Pirn.
